scripts.lint: turbo run lint && bun run scripts:lint
scripts.format: biome format --write . && bun run scripts:format && (cd apps/rust && cargo fmt) && (cd apps/c && bun run format)
scripts.scripts:lint: shellcheck scripts/bash/*.sh scripts/git-hooks/*.sh && (luacheck scripts/lua 2>/dev/null || true) && (ruff check scripts/python 2>/dev/null || true)
scripts.scripts:format: shfmt -i 4 -w scripts/bash/*.sh scripts/git-hooks/*.sh && (stylua scripts/lua 2>/dev/null || true) && (ruff format scripts/python 2>/dev/null || true)
